description: List profit improvements with filtering and pagination.
permissions: Admins can view all profit improvements. Non-admins can view profit improvements for organizations where they have a membership (policy scope joins memberships on organization_id/type).
validation_notes: Date filters expect YYYY-MM-DD. Presence filters expect true/false. Organization ID filtering requires --organization-type or --organization (Type|ID). impact-frequency-estimated and impact-frequency-validated must be one_time or recurring; impact-interval-estimated and impact-interval-validated must be monthly, quarterly, or annual. status must be one of: draft/submitted/rejected/in_progress/completed/validated/recommended/approved/invoiced/cancelled/duplicate.

flags.name: --title
flags.description: Filter by title (partial match)
